sentences.en: a few admin problems
sentences.cn: 一些行政问题

sentences.en: Admin - Lists the Accounts with Administrator rights currently logged in.
sentences.cn: 列出目前线上的Administrator帐号.

sentences.en: Admin sees all the evaluations irrespective of the stages.
sentences.cn: 管理员看到所有的评价不论阶段.

sentences.en: an admin assistant
sentences.cn: 一位行政助理

sentences.en: Doc says the Admin Office Is through the Krauts'mess hall.
sentences.cn: 博士说要去管理者办公室要经过德国人的餐厅大厅?

sentences.en: I have two assistants who help with the admin.
sentences.cn: 我有两个助手协助经营。

sentences.en: In the admin console, navigate to the composition unit.
sentences.cn: 在管理控制台中，导航到组合单元。

sentences.en: Keep confidential for the information for personal and company admin information.
sentences.cn: 为个人及公司的行政信息保密.

sentences.en: Lastly I require a admin section for the listings.
sentences.cn: 最后,我需要的物品管理部分.

sentences.en: Organize the admin . Service work, such reception, and office stationery etc.
sentences.cn: 组织开展行政服务工作, 包括前台接待 、 办公用品.

sentences.en: She works in admin.
sentences.cn: 她做行政工作。

sentences.en: Super Admin gets notification of any item member adds to sale.
sentences.cn: 超级管理员获得任何项目成员的通知增加了销售.

sentences.en: This happened to a page I admin for a theater group.
sentences.cn: 这是发生在一个我所管理的戏剧组的页面上的事。

sentences.en: This way, if there are multiple properties in the same module with the same name, you can distinguish between them in the admin console.
sentences.cn: 这样，如果在同一模块中多个属性具有相同的名称，您可以在管理控制台中对它们进行区分。

sentences.en: Three years working experience on Database development and Admin.
sentences.cn: 三年及以上数据库开发和管理经验.

sentences.en: To pay by credit card, additional 4 % admin fee will be charged.
sentences.cn: 以信用卡缴付续期帐单,将另收4%手续费.

sentences.en: Usually, an admin will be around to revert the bad changes.
sentences.cn: 一般, 管理员会来做恢复页面的工作.

sentences.en: Who can provide me with admin privileges to your access logs?
sentences.cn: 谁可以给我察看你们网络和电话记录的权限?

sentences.en: You have to be a machine admin to perform this operation.
sentences.cn: 您必须是计算机的管理员才能执行此操作.

sentences.en: You need to be a site admin to set this property.
sentences.cn: 只有网站管理员才能设置此属性.
